content.detailedDescription: So i was out in the pasture with my cow. i had turned around to walk home when i heard a humming and a large thump. i turned, and there was a large space craft that had landed on my cow. this strange action, killed my favorite cow. (rip millie, you will be missed.) i wept and some weird orbs came out of the ship and paralyzed me. they then proceed to wrap their misty arms around me and take me back to the ship. inside they started to probe deep into my most personal thoughts and memories. they placed me back where they had found me. i felt very violated and confused. please write me back if you have had a similar experience. also my cow witnessed the part up until it died.
content.summary: Out at farm at mid day feeding millie the cow and was kidnapped by some orbs who paralized me and kiled my cow

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear day and not a cloud in the sky i was in the backyard taking photos of aircrafts that pass by. i have a bridge camera with 65x optical zoom.I have just finished taking a shot on one and as i take the camera off my eye, i noticed this tiny white object (i cannot tell the shape of it whether it is round or square) moving so fast. seems that it was traveling in a straight line and i have taken about 20+ photos of it until i lost sight of it. i enlarge the photos more on my computer hoping that i'll be able to identify it i just couldn't. it's something that i have never seen before.
content.summary: Was in the backyard taking photos airplanes when this obeject caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello
on the evening of sunday (november 13th) around 11:00 pm, i was observing the supermoon and it was very big and bright. i decided to take some pictures and when i looked at them, there was a blue orb surrounding the moon on every picture  i took. when i looked at the moon with my bare eye i wasn't able to see it. so i decided to take a video and thats when i realised that what i saw on the pictures was real.
content.summary: Blue orb surrounding the 2016 supermoon

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a friends yard and heard a humming sound. i looked up and saw this object that was an intense pink color. it simply passed through the sky from west to east.
content.summary: Intense pink light color

content.detailedDescription:
I live in an apartment in far north phoenix (i-17+carefree hwy). i was sitting in my living room, around 7:15-7:30 pm, and i heard a noise, which turned out to be a helicopter.  now, we have plenty of air traffic in our neighborhood, especially with a hospital down the street, but this was louder as it was closer and much lower to the ground.  i'm always fairly alert and curious, but didn't make much of it until i looked out my dining room window, which has a clear view looking west/northwest towards lake pleasant.  what got me out of my seat was white lights that were unaccountable by sound.  i saw the red lights of what was clearly a helicopter and could hear it plainly, but it was following an object that appeared black and had three, constant, white lights in a very obvious triangle structure.  the two came from behind our unit making their trajectory coming from the ne heading sw, but they were very low (maybe 100-200 feet, hard to tell at night).  the object itself was maybe 50 ft from one light to the next, and it was an equilateral triangle.  the triangle made absolutely no noise that i, or my fiance could hear as we were both watching at this point with naked eye and binoculars.  they were moving very slow, even for a helicopter, maybe 20-30 mph.  they moved this direction, toward the i-17 freeway, before turning nw heading towards ben avery range or just slightly east of that where it went behind the small mountains there.  we followed them as they reappeared heading s/sw toward the peoria/glendale area.  at this time they were likely over lake pleasant rd. or close to it.  the object was still moving at the same slow pace, still being followed closely by the helicopter.  during this whole thing, a couple more helicopters came into the area as well.  we followed them as long as we could as they disappeared behind the mountains to the s/sw of us.

this was definitely the closest and largest encounter i'd ever had and wish i was on my patio at the time as it would've been right in front of me and could've provided more details.  honestly, i was quite excited the whole time and i'm still stoked today as i never felt like we were in danger, at all.  i'm constantly looking out our windows and this time it paid off!  i don't have any pictures, but since i'm an artist, i could probably make a drawing or two if need be.
content.summary: Black triangle, followed closely by helicopter, flew (slower than most helicopters) right over head, changed direction at least twice

content.detailedDescription: Heard a rumble and went outside to see a black triangle with a few flashing lights going very slow and it was a full moon so it was clear to see about 3 min or less later another one passed over and did the same exact path as it followed the first ones path, amazing
content.summary: Heard a rumbler went outside and saw 2 rectranglles about 3 min apart

content.detailedDescription: I was at the gerbes grocery store on ash street in columbia mo. i had stopped to get a phone call in without driving my car at the same time. i have a sunroof on the roof of my car and i hung up the cell phone and the sun roof was open and i heard a helicopter and saw looking through the sunroof that it was green in color like a primer green but it wasn't a huey, it looked like a military helicopter but wasn't sure so i thought to take a picture or 2 to see what it looked like maybe zoomed in. i knew pretty sure that it wasn't a helicopter like the kind that was flown in vietnam it was modern and i thought it was just a little odd but not unheard of i live about 50 -70 miles from whitman air force base and there are military planes and stuff that fly over from time to time that i notice. i never saw the object in the pictures until a couple of days after i took the pictures. for some reason i wondered if i had caught anything else in the pictures that i took so i looked at the pictures on my phone and zoomed it in and paned around the photo. i saw this small heart shaped object in the first picture and i was pretty sure it was an object but i wanted to see if it was in the second picture as well and it was now the pictures are taken a good distance between them so i figured that if i can see it in the next picture it wasn't just an anomaly like something wrong with the picture anyway back to the same day i took the pictures, after i took the last picture i could take i just got ready and drove away with no other unusual things that i noticed
content.summary: I saw a helicopter that i thought was military took 2 photos didn't see the ufo until 2 days later when i checked photo for ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
Another black triangle almost identical to my last report - 79485

i was driving on the same road as last report - 56 going west.  as i turned from black mountain road onto the 56 west, on the ramp before even merging i saw the craft at a very low altitude just south of the highway.  as i was heading home from work, at a little before 9:30, i saw a black triangle hover and incredibly slowly proceed almost directly above me. i could see it perfectly as i lowered my driver's side window.  it was a little sw of me and then proceeded across the highway really really slowly with no sound whatsoever.  this craft is about the size and shape of the stealth bomber, except that it has a different set of lights, it moved at about 5 miles and hour and an altitude of approximatly 500ft.  

what's truly bizarre for me is not so much the craft but the no other cars reacted.  truly people are blind to things right infront of their face.  no other cars even slowed down!  it was glaringly obvious if your eye just glanced at it. and it was not hard to notice.  the triangle had two white lights on two corners and inbetween the two lights what looked like a set of three highbeams that made it glaringly obvious.  the triangle was not leading the pointy side of the triangle bit with the back part.  like it was going "backwards".  clearly it can move in any direction. so it looked like the edge of the triangle, with a white light, a set of 3+highbeams and then another white light and the other edge.  there was also a less noticable red light somewhere on the bottom or third corner.  

since this is my second time observing the craft, similar time, similar flight path, i have come to believe it is a military craft.  it looks almost identical to the stealth bomber except it has additional either anti-gravity or mass-minimizing technology.  very nice aircraft.
content.summary: Another black triangle almost identical to last report - 79485

content.detailedDescription: I saw and videod what looked like a group of five bright lights above the horizon. have two videos of the event. they were moving around in no straight pattern, and they were gone in a minute and a half. very bright much brighter than a star. too fast and high for helicopters and too quiet for a jet. kust very curious what it was.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five lights. moving up and down. above horizon. bright but completely silent. vanished quickly.

content.detailedDescription: The object was observed the day of the full moon = appearing apparently behind the moon and then going right to left - video is clear about movement of the orb.
content.summary: Object blue - seen the night of the full moon - you will see the video

content.detailedDescription: My wife came home and showed me a series of photographs of a domed shaped object, that moved a short distance over the coarse of a few minutes, i do have have the photos.
content.summary: Strange object my wife photographed, i do have the photos

content.detailedDescription: 2 bright red orbs side by side and hovering for approximately 5 mins, then changes to bright blue green and moved to our left, then just took off at a high rate of speed to the west until it vanished over the horizon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: On back patio after sunset, 2 orbs appeared out of nowhere and hovered, then changed from red to blue green and quickly went west and dispapered. my son in law and daughter were said , what the hell is that! and took a cell phone pic.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from south carolina to florida on i-95, and had past savannah, ga. i think i remember seeing jet contrails to the ese, which caused me to look in the sky. that's when i noticed a rectangle shape just sitting up in the sky to the southeast. there were clouds below, and clouds above, but this thing just seemed to hang there between the cloud banks. there were drifting clouds that day - large banks of the big, white puffy kind. cumulus?? so, i told my sister to look but don't remember if she did. it was solid, bright, white. i watched this as much as i could while driving but was surprised it didn't seem to move at all. the clouds did. they kept drifting but this "thing" didn't. we went by some very tall trees that hid it from view briefly then was visible again. after a second set of tall trees i noticed the cloud bank below was rising and covering up the "pillar of white." i couldn't tell if the surface was reflective or glowing, it was just a bright white. i have never seen anything like this - ever! really a sight to see. i tried to get an idea of how big it was; at arms length it was about 3/8" to a half inch tall. it never went horizontal. stayed perfectly straight up and down. so weird. no time to get phone out to video or take a photo. rats.
i did look online for weather balloons that were shaped like this but found nothing like this. my husband and i frequently attend mufon meetings and will share this info at the next one.
content.summary: Solid white vertical rectangle. very large.

content.detailedDescription: Saw object hovering, thought it was a drone, as i looked it started to move and i took photos.  appeared flat no blades or other drone/propulsion parts.  see threw but black in some areas.  it moved at a steady pace at ta steady height...
content.summary: Saw object hovering, thought it was a drone, as i looked it started to move and i took phots.  appeared flat no blades or other drone/propellsion parts.  see threw but black in some areas

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on i-8 near piedra, az.  returning from san diego area.  i had been looking up at the moon, which was about to be a super moon in the next day or so.  i noticed a light on the south side of the highway, which was approximately 2-3 feet in size, 75-80 ft away, about 8-10 ft. in front of me (on the side though, in the desert).  i was in the far right lane and this light just continued to keep up with my driving speed.  at first we thought it was coming off the truck in front of me, so i passed the truck.  it disappeared for a minute and then returned in the same spot.  it was just a beam of light moving on the desert landscape, same direction, same speed as my car. it was too bright to be a reflection off of anything.

one of my passengers stuck her head out the window, thinking a helicopter was flying over, but there wasn't anything.  i alerted my other passenger, she agreed, she saw it too.  we watched it and it continued "following" us (really, leading us). the light continued for approximately 15 minutes and then disappeared when we turned onto hwy. 85, near gila bend, az.

in hindsight, i wished i pulled over and stopped my car to see what it did, but didn't.  i was traveling approximately 75-80 miles per hour on the highway.

i felt strange while seeing it and it took awhile before i thought that maybe it was an ufo.  i never had that experience before.  when i got home and googled gila bend and ufo's i had chills running down my body, which i've never had like that before.
content.summary: Beam of light followed my car (parallel) for 15 minutes on i-8/no source for light was seen

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were sitting on porch and was a very clear beautiful night always seeing small planes and helicopters fly over our house, but this was very unusual bright red very bright that we have never seen before.. we starred in ah at what we were witnessing at the moment and we seen three objects next to eachother very very close at within an instant it shot off to the south and still staring at the sky one appeared again very bright very still object in the sky and then disappeared. we were so in shock at what we seen it was 1000% a ufo without a doubt ! i am a true believer 

the siting was over the pacific ocean above catalina island, ca
content.summary: We were sitting outside on our porch and was looking at the sky and seen the bright red that i have never seen before and was hovering over catalina island , ca

content.detailedDescription:
Three lights in a nearly flat triangular pattern observed while looking wsw from hotel window near nm-70 and i-25. the lights first made me think i was looking head-on at an airplane coming in for a landing in my general direction. i observed the lights for about two minutes before realizing they were not getting any closer to me. at that point i texted a friend also staying at the hotel to look. he did not. 

i began to wonder if the light source was something on top of the mountains that are west of the city, but the lights were far above the horizon (60 degrees or more), and when i looked at the mountain vista in the morning, the peaks were far too low, and no buildings or roads were visible on them. 

after observing the lights for another minute or so, i spotted a red strobe light closer to the horizon, traveling from north to southwest. this moved very fast, and i thought (and still think) that this might have been the navigation light of a helicopter or other aircraft, not associated with the object further out. the red strobe seemed much closer to me than the three lights. 


the lights were nondescript, yellow lights, not unlike the landing lights on a commercial aircraft. they were unwavering, and non-blinking. some rays were visible, as if the lights were very bright - like helicopter searchlights - but smaller, higher, and further away. 

after approximately 5 minutes i figured it must be some kind of helicopter, possibly from nearby holman afb or the nasa facility at white sands. i walked away from the window i was looking out of. when i checked back about 10-15 minutes later, the lights were gone. 

i find myself skeptical about most ufo sightings, and i still believe i saw an aircraft (built on earth), but if my account corroborates any other sightings from the same area and time, perhaps it can help your organization figure out the incident. if it was something out of this world, well - wouldn't that be something?
content.summary: Three hovering lights initially assumed to be airplane heading towards me

content.detailedDescription:
"do you see that?" my fiance shouted, pointing through the windshield of her truck while
driving on the 170 freeway (northbound) approx. 1 mile south where it connects to interstate 5 freeway. we were making a trip to our storage unit in sun valley when she noticed it. i looked up at the sky and straight in front of us there was a clearly defined "black beam" appearing from the horizon (somewhere over the desert n of la), exactly overlapping (the left of 2) particularly straight-looking chemtrails currently over the sun valley area in the san fernando valley, los angeles california. this "black beam" seemed circular in shape because it was darkest at it's center and faded on both sides. although it didn't move, as we got closer to driving directly under the chemtrail, it got less and less pronounced until it disappeared entirely while we both observed it constantly. the source of the beam was definitely close by; the chemtrails were very low, less than a mile in altitude. i tried to take a picture with my cellphone, but we were already underneath the chemtrail and the beam already faded out completely.
content.summary: Black beam sighted on 170 fwy from horizon connecting to a chemtrail above the san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription: None
content.summary: I was with my mother we pulled up to  a light at leg mills road and 9w and the said look at that.The next thing we remember is driving to the mall and we went and shopped like nothing weird happened. it was not till later that night that we realize

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home and noticed a howering saucer like object above our land fill. i pulled over and got photos while it was still howering then it took off in the other direction and i didn't see it again.
content.summary: Saw a howering saucer for about 5 minutes then it took off in the other direction

content.detailedDescription: On opening day of deer firearms season i was sitting in the dark looking up like i always do. movement caught my eye as i noticed a bright star that was not stationary. it slowly moved back and forth in the sky. eventually it moved behind the treeline and i lost it. the next morning, i went to a different spot on the property and sat in the tree stand. what looked like a plane headed straight for me shone bright in the sky. after a few minutes the light appeared to stop all forward movement. i found it a bit puzzling as to why this light stopped its path of travel across the sky. i thought i must have been seeing things. maybe it was never moving in the first place. five or so minutes later, the light started moving. left, right,up,down,hover for a bit, then start moving again. at this time i am convinced based on its movements someone is either looking for deer or trespassers on their property. i then saw another orb in the distance making the rounds further out just around the treeline. two people with drones, scouting property in the dark at 5:00 a.M. made sense at the time. i watched the orb closest to me for over an hour. as the sun began to rise, it began to move less and less. i couldn't wait for sunrise to see from what property these drones came. as daybreak progressed, the bright ball of light seemed to get further and further away. by now it was the only thing visible in the sky for several minutes after the other stars vanished. it slowly and steadily shrank  in size until it simply disappeared. i have no idea what it was. this was the third time in the last four years i have seen orbs in the sky and along the treeline. if it was drones. they were super quiet as i was in the woods in the country..Dead silence. i am still perplexed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs in early morning sky

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of double rainbow,on front step has roof( no rain),i didn't see it until looking over my images,unknown( wasn't plane or helicopter,looks like advanced technology whatever it was,i got image o f it in motion too,and fast,directly flew to rainbow,after hour or so a strange lighting storm started( no rain,red lighting,have pic,the strikes were hitting same location over and over,i was excited when saw image,now if we send probes to other planets,then why wouldn't aliens do the same,people are not taking this serious (maybe that is good,but really i understand governments need to keep some secrets but for example nasa camera on i.S.S,going to turn it of,i truly believe that our planet is very important to us,and the visitors,and next day a black big army plane flew over my house so low i could of hit it with golf ball if i was that accurate,and turned exactly where object was
content.summary: Strange. weather double rainbow ufo,black military plane(next day plane

content.detailedDescription: I flew to philadelphia december 2015 i have a habit of taking pics out the plane window i didnt realize at the time that i got these pics  im curious to find out if i actually have pics of a ufo or not
content.summary: i took pics out of the plane window on my way to phil a/p  i didnt realize what i got pics of i would like to find out what it might be possibly nothing

content.detailedDescription: Driving along a rode in california, i stopped to take a picture of a small light hovering above a rock. it grew and then in an instant it was gone
content.summary: Light hovered and flashed, then moved on

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out of the window i seen an orb fly from south to north twisting going from red to white.
first noticed it in the back garden.I thought at first it was a plane but it went across the sky way to fast.I felt excited. i ran upstairs where my cctv was and checked it. video added had to edit it down to an acceptable size
content.summary: Red/white orb

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were relaxing in our family room with the sliding door open one summer in the evening just before dusk it was a beautiful clear evening the sun was just going down. all of a sudden my wife yelled at me to come quick pointing to the sky asking me "whats that"? i said a ufo as i observed the object. it had come out of the west gliding along in a lineal path i estimated at approx 2 to 3000 ft agl. it was a tear shaped orb which shimmered a copper goldish light. it had no empennage, no rotors and made no sound. as a private pilot and aircraft owner i have flown around this area for many years so have good judgment for size and altitude. as the object drew level to our house i estimated the object was around 20 to 30 ft long. it continued on it's easterly direction unmoving from it's path but appeared to accelerate away out of sight. 

the toronto tca starts at 4000 ft over my house, aircraft typically pass in a nw to se direction, however, this in no way was any aircraft i am aware of including not a drone.
content.summary: The event was observed by my wife and myself. the object appeared to be under control in its flight path and accelerated away on the same path.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the trash out at sometime between 7pm and 8pm.  i stepped out the back door (north side) and in my peripheral caught the flashing lights to my right.  my initial thought was it would be a helicopter as we have a tremendous amount of air traffic in this area from north dallas and the surrounding areas. but as i turned and looked i immediately saw this was something different.  

it was a large pulsing extremely bright shape. it made no sound what so ever. i think if i had held my thumb up at arms distance it would have just covered it.  i did not think to check that at the time.  

i started east of me and moved in a circle like fashion counter clockwise towards the north. (after the fact it very much seemed to me that its intension was for me to see it.  it seemed to make me the center point for the arc of its turn.) once it reached the position north of me it just stopped and hovered pulsing brightly.  

somewhere in the mix of this i had yelled for my wife to come look, and she had not heard me. while it was hovering i turned my head to yell again. (i remember being afraid that if i looked away from it it might disappear.  and i really wanted my wife to see it.)  she heard me the second time and came from the front of the house.  by the time she got there it had already started moving to the north and as such was a lot smaller in the sky.  but as soon as she saw it she recognized that it was something other than the normal craft around there. it moved beyond the branches of our neighbors trees.

when it started to move away it was a bit deceptive as to its speed.  i thought that maybe we could jump into the car and catch another good close up glimpse of it, so we took off. i think we went about a mile but it was apparent after that it was moving fast.  i disappeared into what i think was high level clouds to the north.  

it was a clear night for the most part we could see planes around every where (commercial airliners that is.) 

here is a more detailed description as best as i can give.
pulsating red lights above below and all over.  it seemed to be diamond shaped but i could not tell for sure as the light pulsed and changed so rapidly that maybe the shape was just glare in my eyes. it seemed to me that there might have been a horizontal division across the middle of the diamond. like a spot where there were no lights dividing the diamond into a upper and lower half. but it is hard to state definitely. after looking on youtube the closest appearance would be the orbs in pennsylvania. 

my wife had her phone and attempted to get a picture but it moved away to quickly beyond the tree branches.
content.summary: Red diamond pulsating brightly.  did a quarter of a circle around me then moved quickly to the north while ascending into high level clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
@1:05am woke up suddenly, went to porch for cigarrette, immediately saw massive triangle in sky, and not tr3b like, more of a spear head?? it hovered anove the texaco for almost 3 minutes..3 bluish glowing orbs did descend from bottom of craft, do a quick lap around the shopping square, vanish quickly towards lockheed, then the orbs returned and went back into underneath of ship, no "door" was visible although a faint sound heard of sliding mechanisims.  the surface was visible as low enough street lights cast off bottom, faint symbolicistic etchings markings on black surface? but a diff black? not as light absorbant in these etchings i guess? i saw no form of engine nore saw any light/flame for engine, however, faint static discharge in whirring motion hearsd,immediately i felt ill to stomach, high anxiety, as if complete hertz change within body rythm, shaking, i couldn't talk, and as i lifted my camera to take a picture i could feel speech??? not hear it, but feel it???? i can even almost make out what i heard, and then immediately it began to ascend and then leave to west at high rate off speed, for it's size, i would imagine it would have made it from here, to austin in about 5 minutes at that speed, both of my cats that went out with me were affected as they hissed and scuttled under house and i did see them look up too! i felt a weight, as if it had a pressure om me as if i was unable to move as quickily as i would hav eliked, the cell phone out of pocket was a feet i didnt expect. my cell phone however was showing nothibng but fuzz on the screen, my televison immediately became very loud with high pitch wail, as the ascent and leaving took place two neighbors came outside, one asked if i had heard a strange electrical noise outside... i just sat in middle of hwy lauging at my explanation to this guy i know. he would have flailed me if i said ufo.

i live about 8 miles from lockheed and carswell.... the craft did not return to that driect, and besides, the massive size would not be contained on that site...

attempted calling lockhed/carswell to see if they had anytyong on radar i was so laughed at.


the etchings on seurface if u call it that, ver intersting, as i sit and remember it seems to me it lookd very aztec in nature.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walk out to smoke, hovering massive triangle, i start to take picture, it leaves abruptly with fast dirct change.
